Creates a new Floor

Parameters:
strike - Floor strike
tenor - Tenor of the floorlets

calendar - Calendar used for the pricing
timeStep - Fraction of year corresponding to a calendar day
Method Detail

createXlet

public Xlet<T> createXlet(T present,
                          T evaluationTime,
                          T cashflowTime,
                          double tenor,
                          double timeStep)
Description copied from interface: XletFactory
Create a caplet or floorlet

Parameters:
present - Present time for discounting
evaluationTime - Time of evaluation of forward rate and payoff
cashflowTime - Time of cashflow, to be discounted to present
tenor - Tenor of the caplet/floorlet
timeStep - Time step used for calculating discount
Returns:
A concrete Xlet: either a caplet of floorlet
